feature_description: Add age-based article filtering with a frontend time range slider. Default 24 hours, max 30 days. Filter articles BEFORE LLM calls in feed_fetcher.py to reduce costs. Add get_archive_range() method to s3_store.py for fetching multiple days of archive. Frontend slider in index.html with styling in style.css, controlled by app.js. Slider pulls from archive and merges with current data. Add default_age_hours setting to config/feeds.json global_settings.
workflow_path: init → analyst → spec_generator → constitution → architect → task_decomposer
